HTMLLinkElementHreflang.summary: The hreflang property of the is used to indicate the language and the geographical targeting of a page. This hint can be used by browsers to select the more appropriate page or to improve {{Glossary("SEO")}}.

remarks.para: It reflects the hreflang attribute of the link element and is the empty string ("") if there is no hreflang attribute.

HTMLLinkElementHreflang.value: A string that contains a language tag, or the empty string ("") if there is no hreflang attribute.
